title: 이달의소녀탐구 #157 (LOONA TV #157)
summary:
0:01 -- LOONA ⅓ going to the mv set for JinSoul’s birthday. They brought her a cake.
0:25 -- ⅓ finally meets JinSoul and ViVi unnie points out how beautiful she is.
0:30 -- JinSoul introducing her animal to the girls.
0:49 -- HyunJin gets shocked after seeing a lot of Gold fishes.
0:55 -- A wild Lippie appears. She will be rapping with MomSeul soon!
